name: Swift Squrriel
description:
Controlls:

asd/arrow keys to move

w/up arrow/space bar to jump or dive while in mid air

Swift Squirrel is a thrilling 2D platformer game that features a fast-paced, pixel art gameplay that will leave you on the edge of your seat! You play as a nimble squirrel who is determined to beat the clock and complete each level in record time. With nine challenging levels set in a forest, train, and clouds, your reflexes and speed will be put to the test.

As you progress through each level, you must dodge obstacles and enemies, collect the acorn, and jump your way to the finish line before time runs out. With simple controls and intuitive gameplay mechanics, Swift Squirrel is easy to pick up and play, but difficult to master.

The forest level is full of tall trees, deep ravines, and tricky jumps that require precise timing and skill. The train level takes you through a speeding locomotive where you must avoid obstacles and jump through conveyor belts. Finally, the clouds level will challenge you with its fluffy, white clouds and tornado's.

With its vibrant pixel art graphics and fast-paced gameplay, Swift Squirrel is the perfect game for fans of platformers and retro-style gaming. Are you ready to take on the challenge and become the ultimate swift squirrel? Play Swift Squirrel now!

Donate if you feel like it so i can try to make more games!

Credits:
